action_description: This action will control other devices which you have created in Brilliant Nexus app
This action will control your Brilliant nexus switches which you have created in Brilliant Nexus
This action will control your Television remote which you have created in Brilliant Nexus app
This action will control your Air conditioning remote which you have created in your Brilliant Nexus app.
This action will be able to control your Lights which you have created on Brilliant Nexus app
This action will be able to control your Brilliant Nexus actions which you have created in your Brilliant Nexus app
